main_definition: Sisters can refer to both the biological siblings who share one or both parents, as well as a group of individuals with a common bond or purpose.

meanings_and_examples.example: My two sisters and I grew up playing together in the backyard.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Female friends with a strong bond
meanings_and_examples.example: She has her own group of female friends, whom she calls her 'sisters', who support each other like family members.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Groups with a shared purpose or interest
meanings_and_examples.example: The volunteers at the animal shelter are not related by blood but consider themselves sisters in their love for animals.
